Line1.10BCF2: The Old One. Bringer of Bliss Eternal. When I saw its smileâ€¦ nothing else mattered. I felt it. Heard its whisper, but then... silence.
Line5.10BCF2: But I know it can speak. Know these dead have heard its words.

VoiceDir1.10BCF2: emotional, spoken with deep respect.; sad closure
